item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven and the nearby area.

5/2/2011's location will be:

Pacifico

Pacifico is a highly regarded Restaurant with Bar on the corner of Temple and Crown Streets in Downtown New Haven. They specialize in pasta and seafood dishes with a Latin influence. They are also home to what some argue is the best Mojito in town.

Specials for NHC members will run from 6 pm to 9pm:
$7 General Drinks But NOT on Top Shelf Brands  (Mojitos, Gin & Tonic, Vodka & Soda, ect.)
$4 Beers
There is promise of free Guacamole and Chips put out at the Bar!

A Special Thanks to Americo for setting up this Happy Hour! He plans to host and can be reached at ﻿203 631 8418 if you have questions. We really appreciate this.

For Happy Hour type events, please post it in your RSVP notes if you are only a "Maybe".


Hope to see you all there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend**
item.how_to_find_us: We are usually the Largest group at the Bar on a Monday. If that does not work, feel free to call the contact/host listed in the description.
item.why: Seems right for Cinco-De-Mayo week! (Yes, I know it's Latin and not Mexican, but still more appropriate than many others.)
item.name: Happy Hour at Pacifico
